description: JSON Schema for lot class in Elephant Lexicon

driveway_material.description: The material of the driveway on the lot.

landscaping_features.description: Features associated with the landscaping on the lot.

lot_area_sqft.description: Total land size in square feet for a property

lot_condition_issues.description: AI-observed lot-level maintenance or neglect issues.

lot_length_feet.description: The length of the lot in feet (typically the side parallel to the street).

lot_size_acre.description: The size of the lot in acre.

lot_type.description: Refers to characteristics associated with a lot and structure.

lot_width_feet.description: The width of the lot in feet (typically the depth of the property from front to back).

paving_area_sqft.description: Total paved area in square feet

paving_installation_date.description: Installation date of paving (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY)

request_identifier.description: Identifier value that should be substituted into the source HTTP request to retrieve this specific data.

site_lighting_fixture_count.description: Total number of light fixtures installed on the property

site_lighting_type.description: Type and height of outdoor lighting fixtures on the lot

source_http_request.description: HTTP request configuration for retrieving this data.

body.description: The body of the request, which may contain JSON or other data formats.

content-type.description: Content-Type header for the request, indicating the media type of the resource.

url.description: The URL endpoint for the request.

view.description: Descriptive tag of the view from the lot.

title: lot
